experience.shortDescription: Contributing to Brandgravity, a conversational analytics platform for digital marketing managers, and building scalable AI-driven reporting and RAG capabilities.
description: Developed and enhanced a chat interface that allows marketing managers to query BigQuery campaign data using natural language.
Built a background reporting service on Cloud Run, scheduled via Cloud Scheduler, using Python with the OpenAI and Slack SDKs to automate weekly Slackbot report deliveries.
Implemented multitenant data isolation and access controls to securely onboard external clients, ensuring each customer interacts only with their own datasets.
Designed and prototyped a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) feature to let users augment campaign analytics with custom datasets and external context.
Collaborated with data engineering and DevOps teams to optimize performance, security, and CI/CD pipelines for production readiness.
Continuously scaling the system architecture to support growing user volume and introducing new AI-powered insights and features.

experience.shortDescription: Architecting an LLM-powered career advisor that pinpoints skill gaps and recommends tailored courses to accelerate user career goals.
description: Prototyping an AI career-advisor service that parses user profiles with transformer-based NLP models and benchmarks skills against target job requirements.
Designing a recommendation engine that maps identified gaps to courses in the LMS catalogue, delivering personalized learning paths.
Building a skills-to-course knowledge graph and vector-search index (Python, LangChain, pgvector) for real-time gap analysis.
Partnering with subject-matter experts to refine competency taxonomies and define metrics for continuous recommendation-quality improvement.

experience.shortDescription: Engineering scalable backend systems and APIs for interview benchmarking and scheduling.
description: Resolved a critical TypeORM migration issue causing silent column drops, preventing data loss across production tables.
Enabled multi-host scheduling to support 40+ concurrent interviews (Zoom SDK) per day, reducing wait times by 75%.
Implemented automated SMS (Twilio) and email (SendGrid) reminder jobs to notify candidates and interviewers of upcoming interviews, reducing no-shows and last-minute reschedules by 30%.
Developed backend APIs for a benchmark dashboard comparing candidate interviews across 100+ job postings.
Improved backend observability by implementing structured logging with Winston, reducing debug time by 40% and persisting logs to AWS S3 for long-term access.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using JIRA and PostgreSQL to enhance platform performance.

experience.shortDescription: Developing and deploying backend systems for a scalable Christian dating platform, enhancing user features and automating deployment processes.
description: Engineered and deployed backend modules using Express.js, scaling server-side applications to handle 10,000 users and reducing response time by 40%.
Managed deployment processes for two services on Google App Engine with Unix sockets, using CI/CD pipelines on GitHub to automate staging and production deployments.
Orchestrated PostgreSQL database migrations, achieving 100% data integrity and reducing downtime by 40%.
Implemented webhooks to handle subscription renewals for App Store and Google Play subscriptions, eliminating reliance on third-party tools and reducing 100% transaction fees.
Developed and deployed backend modules for a scalable Christian dating app, enhancing features like matchmaking, activity tracking, and subscription management.
Created the Activity feature to track in-app activities and display them to users, enhancing engagement and transparency.
Built the SalesOps feature to sell one-time bundles by combining items from the in-app product inventory, integrating payment workflows efficiently.
Enhanced the matchmaking system with exact and mostCompatible matching features, improving match accuracy and user satisfaction.
Contributed to smaller features that enriched user experience, including gifting, match guessing, reviews, invites, and more.
Currently working on an AI-feed bot that posts routine content with topic selection based on user interaction, leveraging AI to improve engagement.
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automate deployment of services to Google Cloud Platform’s App Engine (GAE).
Utilized Sequelize ORM to maintain database uniformity and integrity across development, staging, and production environments.
Managed databases on GCP SQL with PostgreSQL servers and utilized GCP Cloud Storage for hosting user media files.
Ensured version control and collaborative development using Git, adhering to best practices in branching and code reviews.
Integrated Firebase authentication for secure user sign-in and token management, with user data stored in Firestore.

experience.shortDescription: Led React/WordPress development of core platform modules and managed a 5-engineer team, delivering scalable, user-centric features.
description: Designed end-to-end feature flows and authored SRS documentation for 5+ core modules (user management, job board, LMS, membership, and directory), accelerating development velocity by 30%.
Developed directory and user management UIs in React, reducing user onboarding and profile completion time by 45% through streamlined form flows and real-time validation.
Established CI review pipelines and coding standards that decreased post-deployment bugs by 35% and improved feature delivery consistency across sprints.
Led a 5-member engineering team, resolving critical bugs 40% faster and sustaining 99.9% uptime across production services during peak user activity.

experience.shortDescription: Conducted comprehensive data analysis and optimization for EV behavior datasets, enhancing data quality and system performance.
description: Analyzed data to pinpoint significant EV behavior locations from 3+ vast location datasets.
Conducted data quality assurance and corrected inconsistencies, improving data accuracy by 25%.
Launched AWS RDS Postgres instances, conducted query performance analysis and optimization, improving response time by 35%.
Simulated a comprehensive 6-month EV charging station dataset, showcasing data versatility and scalability.
Performed data analysis and pipelining using AWS RDS, PostgreSQL, and Python, enhancing data processing and preparing datasets for machine learning applications.

experience.shortDescription: Developed automated systems for chipset design tracing and validation, significantly improving efficiency and error detection.
description: Engineered an automated chipset design tracing and validation system, reducing manual validation time by 50%.
Introduced a source-to-target path-tracing algorithm with pin path validation at every step, increasing error detection rate by 40%.
Crafted a GUI interface enabling rapid identification of errors and discrepancies, improving debugging speed by 35%.
